Class FurnitureTile

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.Tile
model.FurnitureTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class FurnitureTile extends Tile
Represents an interactable piece of furniture in the game world. Furniture can be searched by the player, may contain a puzzle piece, and can "vanish" after being searched.
See Also:
